https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter._instruction: Enter all identifiers for this strain, excluding its ontological identifers or RRID (e.g., identifiers from the Mouse Genome Informatics (MGI) database or Rat Genome Database (RGD)).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter.title: alternateIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/backg._instruction: Add the background strain that explains the majority of the genetic background and/or causes the majority of the prominent traits. If two strains contributed equally, state both.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/backg.title: backgroundStrain

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/breed._instruction: Add the breeding type for this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/breed.title: breedingType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a short text describing this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.title: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the 'Research Resource Identifier' (RRID) of this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.title: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/disea._instruction: Add all (human) diseases and/or conditions that this strain is a model for.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/disea.title: diseaseModel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/genet._instruction: Add the genetic background type of this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/genet.title: geneticStrainType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/labor._instruction: Enter the laboratory code assigned by the Institute of Laboratory Animal Research (ILAR) for the investigator or organization that has created this strain following the defined pattern (e.g., Aaa).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/labor.title: laboratoryCode

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.title: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.title: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/pheno._instruction: Enter a short description for the phenotype of this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/pheno.description: Physical expression of one or more genes of an organism.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/pheno.title: phenotype

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci._instruction: Add the species of this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.description: Category of biological classification comprising related organisms or populations potentially capable of interbreeding, and being designated by a binomial that consists of the name of a genus followed by a Latin or latinized uncapitalized noun or adjective.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/speci.title: species

identifier._instruction: Enter the stock number of an item provided by a store or company.
identifier.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone.
identifier.title: identifier

vendor._instruction: Add the vendor that has the item with this identifier in stock.
vendor.title: vendor

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon._instruction: Enter any synonyms (inlcuding abbreviations) of this strain.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon.description: Words or expressions used in the same language that have the same or nearly the same meaning in some or all senses.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/synon.title: synonym
